game.name: ChloroLink
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In a cute and cozy management/exploration game, guide Lux the sprout of life as she spreads her rootweave to connect charming flowers. Use each plant’s growth pattern to explore, reinforce the links between plants, overcome gentle challenges, and help Lux bloom the world back to life!
